CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK("/" & "lightning/cmp/vlocity_cmt__vlocityLWCOmniWrapper?c__target=c:aRTLInvokeERPEnglish&c__layout=lightning&c__tabIcon=custom:custom18&c__consumerTransactionId="+ Id + "&c__ouName=" + Quote_Line_Item__r.ARTL_OUName__c + "&c__consumerName=" + Master_Order__r.Account.Name + "&c__activityAction=" + "NIPS_PR_Details" + "&c__requisitionNumber=" + Requisition_Number__c + "&c__orderId=" + Master_Order__c , "Fetch PR","_self" )
CustomField.label: Fetch PR
